titleStmt.title: Latine songs with their English, and poems by Henry Bold ... ; collected and perfected by Captain William Bold.
Carmina et poemata. English & Latin
titleStmt.author: Bold, Henry, 1627-1683.
Bold, William.

notesStmt.note: Includes the ballad, Chevy Chase, and Suckling's poem, Why so pale and wan fond lover? with Latin versions by Bold. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
